name: Candy Time Blitz-Tournament Edition
description:
Use your skillz to win real cash!

In this colorful, fun match-3 game, you're really rewarded for your abilities.

  • Join the eSport revolution! Play the game you love against real players for real cash or virtual prizes
  • Easy to play - Just match 3 candies or more of the same color and watch your points go up
  • Win even bigger prizes by competing in special tournaments and events
  • With each match lasting 2 minutes, Candy Time Blitz – Tournament Edition is the sweetest way to pass the time…

    • Download now and find out why it's always time for candy ;)

    Candy Time Blitz – Tournament Edition is operated by Skillz Inc.
